attributes.action: Reverse the decision to charge aTV licence fee for the over 75s
attributes.additional_details: Please look at other ways to recover this money, i e. You could give less tax advantages to the very wealthy, you could even make the TV licence ,credited at the moment to the over 75s, taxable as Benefit in Kind. I am quite sure the cost could be recovered in other ways given the willingness to do so.
attributes.background: Many over 75s do not qualify for Pension Credit so those will have to pay, or be without a TV, most pensioners only company is their TV, If this proposal come into effect next year it will create tremendous social damage to the elderly
